Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points, Allen Iverson added 28 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Kevin Garnett , holding on for a 124-118 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams, Allen Iverson said.
